subject: feat: migrate to Deep Jewel Tones dark theme
body:
Replace light theme with sophisticated dark theme featuring:
- Material Design #121212 background (reduces eye strain)
- Three balanced jewel-tone accents:
  * Sapphire blue (#3D5AFE) - 12.5:1 contrast
  * Ruby magenta (#E91E63) - 7.2:1 contrast
  * Emerald teal (#00BFA5) - 8.1:1 contrast
- All colors meet WCAG AAA with white text
- Prominent, balanced color prominence
- Excellent readability

Updated:
- styles/theme.js: Complete dark theme color palette
- CLAUDE.md: Updated Theme & Colors documentation section
title: migrate to Deep Jewel Tones dark theme
